fields.name: Alignment:
fields.value:
Rebel Support
**Attack**
None
**Defense**
None
**Abilities:**
- Take a photograph at night.
**Attributes:**
- With the Rebel Flag, you have an extra use.
- You can photograph twice.
- You can photograph other Rebels.
- Photographed people will be frozen in time.
- Photographed players will not be able to be killed, transported, etc. for two nights.
- Photographed players, when voting, will be forced to vote for who they voted in the trial before the picture for two nights.
- Being risen by a Retributionist, Necromancer, or Archivist will perform the ability as normal.
**Goal:**
Kill all who oppose the Rebellion.
